TheAlchemist:BagOfBricks.NAME: Bag Of Bricks
TheAlchemist:BagOfBricks.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of potions you have.

TheAlchemist:Embers.NAME: Embers
TheAlchemist:Embers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:FireStrike.NAME: Fire Strike
TheAlchemist:FireStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Injection.NAME: Injection
TheAlchemist:Injection.DESCRIPTION: Discard your last potion. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison.

TheAlchemist:Prohibition.NAME: Prohibition
TheAlchemist:Prohibition.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you don't have potions. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you don't have potions.

TheAlchemist:Recipes.NAME: Recipes
TheAlchemist:Recipes.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage for every !M! cards you have.
TheAlchemist:Recipes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage for every card you have.

TheAlchemist:ShadowControl.NAME: Shadow Control
TheAlchemist:ShadowControl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Scales with enemy powers.

TheAlchemist:ShiftingSand.NAME: Shifting Sand
TheAlchemist:ShiftingSand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you deal blocked damage, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element. NL If you deal unblocked damage, gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Sparks.NAME: Sparks
TheAlchemist:Sparks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you gain a thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element, return this from your discard pile to your Hand.

TheAlchemist:Splatter.NAME: Splatter
TheAlchemist:Splatter.DESCRIPTION: Discard your last potion. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

TheAlchemist:SonicBlast.NAME: Sonic Blast
TheAlchemist:SonicBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:TheStone.NAME: The Stone
TheAlchemist:TheStone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! gold and heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
TheAlchemist:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element for each enemy damaged. NL Exhaust.
TheAlchemist:Wildfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element for each enemy damaged.

TheAlchemist:AlkalineAir.NAME: Alkaline Air
TheAlchemist:AlkalineAir.DESCRIPTION: Reduce Weak by 2. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Element.
TheAlchemist:AlkalineAir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce Weak and Frail by 2. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Bezoar.NAME: Bezoar
TheAlchemist:Bezoar.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all of your Debuffs. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
TheAlchemist:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain 2 thealchemist:Dark thealchemist:Elements. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:BlackMagic.NAME: Black Magic
TheAlchemist:BlackMagic.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL If you exhausted a curse, Gain 1 thealchemist:Magic thealchemist:Elements. NL Exhaust.
TheAlchemist:BlackMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL If you exhausted a curse, Gain 1 thealchemist:Magic thealchemist:Elements.

TheAlchemist:BloodInfusion.NAME: Blood Infusion
TheAlchemist:BloodInfusion.DESCRIPTION: Transfer your poison to the enemy.

TheAlchemist:Breezy.NAME: Breezy
TheAlchemist:Breezy.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, discard your !M! leftmost card, then draw that many cards.
TheAlchemist:Breezy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, discard your !M! leftmost cards, then draw that many cards.

TheAlchemist:CautiousBrew.NAME: Cautious Brew
TheAlchemist:CautiousBrew.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Elements. NL Otherwise gain !M! thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Elements.

TheAlchemist:CleansingLight.NAME: Cleansing Light
TheAlchemist:CleansingLight.DESCRIPTION: Discard your last potion. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Light thealchemist:Element.
TheAlchemist:CleansingLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your last potion. NL Gain 2 thealchemist:Light thealchemist:Elements.

TheAlchemist:Fog.NAME: Fog
TheAlchemist:Fog.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Water and 1 thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Gust.NAME: Gust
TheAlchemist:Gust.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Element. NL Draw 1 card.
TheAlchemist:Gust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Elements. NL Draw 1 card.

TheAlchemist:LeechStrength.NAME: Leech Strength
TheAlchemist:LeechStrength.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Strength this turn, the enemy loses an equal amount. NL Exhaust.
TheAlchemist:LeechStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you gain strength this turn, enemy loses an equal amount.

TheAlchemist:LiquidShield.NAME: Liquid Shield
TheAlchemist:LiquidShield.DESCRIPTION: Discard your last potion. NL Gain !B! Block.

TheAlchemist:PackedEarth.NAME: Packed Earth
TheAlchemist:PackedEarth.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element.
TheAlchemist:PackedEarth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element and gain !M! Block.

TheAlchemist:Reagent.NAME: Reagent
TheAlchemist:Reagent.DESCRIPTION: Gain an thealchemist:Element you already have. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:SearingLight.NAME: Searing Light
TheAlchemist:SearingLight.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thealchemist:Light thealchemist:Element. NL Gain !M! thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:SpiritOfVitriol.NAME: Spirit Of Vitriol
TheAlchemist:SpiritOfVitriol.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes poison damage. NL Exhaust.
TheAlchemist:SpiritOfVitriol.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes poison damage twice. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:Streamer.NAME: Streamer!
TheAlchemist:Streamer.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 more [E] for each empty potion slot. NL Gain !B! Block.

TheAlchemist:Tailwind.NAME: Tailwind
TheAlchemist:Tailwind.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! cards. NL Gain 2 thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Elements.

TheAlchemist:ToxicBrew.NAME: Toxic Brew
TheAlchemist:ToxicBrew.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Water thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
TheAlchemist:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Transform up to !M! card in your hand.
TheAlchemist:Transmute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform up to !M! cards in your hand.

TheAlchemist:Trenches.NAME: Trenches
TheAlchemist:Trenches.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:UnstableElixir.NAME: Unstable Elixir
TheAlchemist:UnstableElixir.DESCRIPTION: If you play all thealchemist:Basic_Elements this turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

TheAlchemist:WaterBubble.NAME: Water Bubble
TheAlchemist:WaterBubble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Water thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Creation.NAME: Creation
TheAlchemist:Creation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

TheAlchemist:Dredges.NAME: Dredges
TheAlchemist:Dredges.DESCRIPTION: Combat end: gain a copy of the last potion used this combat.

TheAlchemist:FumeHood.NAME: Fume Hood
TheAlchemist:FumeHood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain an thealchemist:Element, gain !M! Block.

TheAlchemist:Growth.NAME: Growth
TheAlchemist:Growth.DESCRIPTION: If you gain 1 of every thealchemist:Element, gain 1 thealchemist:Fruit_Juice.

TheAlchemist:HunkerDown.NAME: Hunker Down
TheAlchemist:HunkerDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain 99 NoBlock. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element.
TheAlchemist:HunkerDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Gain 99 NoBlock. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:SacredForm.NAME: Sacred Form
TheAlchemist:SacredForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Double the effectiveness of potions. NL When you use a potion gain 1 Poison.
TheAlchemist:SacredForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double the effectiveness of potions. NL When you use a potion gain 1 Poison.

TheAlchemist:Sublimation.NAME: Sublimation
TheAlchemist:Sublimation.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a potion, gain !M! Strength.

TheAlchemist:TheBestDefense.NAME: The Best Defense...
TheAlchemist:TheBestDefense.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain an thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element this turn, gain !M! Thorn. NL Exhaust.
TheAlchemist:TheBestDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain an thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element this turn, gain !M! Thorns.
